Opportunity Standard
v0.0.0-29

The Opportunity Standard is currently a work-in-progress. Please reach out to products@nycopportunity.nyc.gov with any questions.

Utilities Tailwindcss

Buttons

Default Button

@nycopportunity/pattern-elements/src/elements/buttons

Demonstration
Code
<button type="button">
  <span>Default Button (Unstyled)</span>
</button>

Buttons should be written using the <button> html tag. However, if a button is an <a> tag styled with the .btn class and has in-page functionality (such as toggling elements), the role attribute should be set to “button” and the tabindex attribute should be set to “0.” Refer to the best practices described in the MDN documentation for the “button” role.

If the button is a <button> element and appears within a <form> tag, the type attribute should be explicitly set to “button,” “reset,” or “submit.” By default (without the type attribute) <button> elements are set to the “submit” type.

The base button class, .btn, is extended with additional button classes described below.

Styled Button

@nycopportunity/pattern-elements/src/elements/buttons

Demonstration
Code
<button class="btn" type="button">
  <span>Styled Button</span>
</button>

Primary Button

@nycopportunity/pattern-elements/src/elements/buttons

Demonstration
Code
<button class="btn-primary" type="button">
  <span>Primary Button</span>
</button>

Secondary Button

@nycopportunity/pattern-elements/src/elements/buttons

Demonstration
Code
<button class="btn-secondary" type="button">
  <span>Secondary Button</span>
</button>

Tertiary Button

@nycopportunity/pattern-elements/src/elements/buttons

Demonstration
Code
<button class="btn-tertiary" type="button">
  <span>Tertiary Button</span>
</button>

Link Button

@nycopportunity/pattern-elements/src/elements/buttons

Demonstration
Learn more about links
Code
<a class="btn btn" href="/links">
  <span>Learn more about links</span>
  <svg aria-hidden="true" class="icon-ui rtl:flip">
    <use href="#lucide-arrow-right"></use>
  </svg>
</a>

External Link Button

@nycopportunity/pattern-elements/src/elements/buttons

Demonstration
designsystem.digital.gov
Code
<a class="btn btn" href="https://designsystem.digital.gov/components/button/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
  <span>designsystem.digital.gov</span>
  <svg aria-hidden="true" class="icon-ui rtl:flip">
    <use href="#lucide-external-link"></use>
  </svg>
</a>

Button with Icon Prefix

@nycopportunity/pattern-elements/src/elements/buttons

Demonstration
Code
<button class="btn" type="button">
  <svg aria-hidden="true" class="icon-ui rtl:flip">
    <use href="#lucide-share-2"></use>
  </svg>
  <span>Share this page</span>
</button>

Small Button

@nycopportunity/pattern-elements/src/elements/buttons

Demonstration
Code
<button class="btn-small" type="button">
  <span>Small Button</span>
</button>

Responsive Button

@nycopportunity/pattern-elements/src/elements/buttons

Demonstration
Code
<button class="btn-small desktop:btn" type="button">
  <span>Responsive Button</span>
</button>

Tag Button

@nycopportunity/pattern-elements/src/elements/buttons

Demonstration
Code
<button class="btn-tag" type="button">
  <span>Tag Button</span>
</button>

Disabled Buttons

@nycopportunity/pattern-elements/src/elements/buttons

Demonstration
Code
<div class="grid grid-cols-3 gap-3">
  <button disabled="" type="button">Disabled Default Button</button>
  <button class="btn" disabled="" type="button">Disabled Styled Button</button>
  <button class="btn btn-primary" disabled="" type="button">Disabled Primary Button</button>
</div>

Toggle Button

@nycopportunity/pattern-elements/src/elements/buttons

Demonstration
Toggle button target element area
Code
<div class="layout-content w-full">
  <div class="wrap">
    <button aria-controls="btn-toggle-target" aria-expanded="true" class="btn-toggle w-full mb-2" data-js="toggle" type="button">
      <span>Toggle Button</span>
      <svg aria-hidden="true" class="icon-ui">
        <use href="#lucide-chevron-down"></use>
      </svg>
    </button>
    <div aria-hidden="false" class="bg-scale-2 p-4 text-center active" id="btn-toggle-target">Toggle button target element area</div>
  </div>
</div>
